name: Rogue Invader (itch)
description:
You are the invader attacking the alien horde in this genre-flipping roguelike shooter. Game-play is smooth and resembles old-school isometric games, with some modern touches and HD graphics.

Twenty years ago, the zenos began invading terran colonies, leaving a trail of death and tears in their wake. Terrans fought back, one planet at a time, while building a fleet to stab at the zeno home-world.

You arrive with that fleet, just after a massive space battle where all the supply ships have been destroyed. You are left with a huge invasion army but no supplies to invade with other than one drop-pod and one pistol.

Good luck.

_______

With each soldier you send, you can collect new weapons and resources to rebuild your arsenal and improve the success of the next soldier's invasion.
